origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'NetEaseAPI.get_tech_expenses', 'description': 'This function retrieves the technology development expenses of a specified company over a given number of years, specifically for a certain category.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the company, e.g., NetEase.'}, {'name': 'years', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of years to retrieve data for.'}, {'name': 'category', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The category of technology development, e.g., game_development, AI, etc.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'expenses', 'description': 'The total technology development expenses for the specified category over the given years.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 NetEaseAPI.get_tech_expenses, 它的参数输入如下: 'company'是'NetEase', 'years'是'5', 'category'是'game_development'.
